title: 8th Avenue
content: [8th Avenue.](http://web.archive.org/)Named for the street I lived on in my home town... 7 blocks from the creek and 2 from the deep dark woods.
author: russellm

comments.content:
A recursive release!  
(your link points to this same thread)

Nice one, it has a kind handmade vibe.

It reminds me a bit of these:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/78833](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110423/http:/www.typophile.com/node/78833 "http://www.typophile.com/node/78833")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/65360](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110423/http:/typophile.com/node/65360 "http://typophile.com/node/65360")

Have you thought to offer a reversed contrast |A| as alternate?

Thanks.

<cite>Have you thought to offer a reversed contrast |A| as alternate?</cite>

I had, early on, and the same for |V| & |W| (plus U/C & l/c) but I decided against it.
It's not my style aesthetically, but I love it anyway. Really cool retro look.
